column3: Latest;Siem Reap: Two teenage girls were arrested by police after stealing a motorcycle.------The 16-year-old and 15-year-old girls arrested are from in Kampong Thkov village
column6: Siem Reap Province.------Police said the Honda Dream was stolen from 27 year old Heng Sopheak on February 4
column8: at 10:25 pm after he left it under his house with the key nearby.------The pair were arrested at 11 am the following day after being seen in a hairdressing salon in Siem Reap town.------The girls are being questioned and will be sent to the Special Administrative Office to decide on further action.------Source
